Articles.Content:
Does anyone know of a mod that requires the player to stockpile certain resources, outside of career mode? For example: Rather than being able to fill a KSPIe antimatter tank with an arbitrary amount of antimatter, the player first has to collect that much antimatter, then recover it on Kerbin.

Alternatively, a mod that lets you prohibit certain resources from being added in the VAB/SPH, so the player has to bring that vehicle to a space station/base that has some of that resource to fill up the tanks.

On 10/6/2023 at 8:38 AM, RSPhantomPhoenix said:

Does anyone know of a mod that requires the player to stockpile certain resources, outside of career mode? For example: Rather than being able to fill a KSPIe antimatter tank with an arbitrary amount of antimatter, the player first has to collect that much antimatter, then recover it on Kerbin.

Not in KSP1  or in KSP2 yet!

On 10/6/2023 at 8:38 AM, RSPhantomPhoenix said:

Alternatively, a mod that lets you prohibit certain resources from being added in the VAB/SPH, so the player has to bring that vehicle to a space station/base that has some of that resource to fill up the tanks.

I've thought that myself.  It would be cool.  The only way I can think of is to make it SO VERY EXPENSIVE so that you only want to harvest it or produce it off world.

On 10/7/2023 at 5:16 PM, theJesuit said:

I've thought that myself.  It would be cool.  The only way I can think of is to make it SO VERY EXPENSIVE so that you only want to harvest it or produce it off world.

New plugin idea for me to make instead of working on my part mod...
